description:
Eric emailed me out of the blue.
Manhunt.net had been using his images to advertise, and he was a little shocked, but thankfully, in a good way!
Sometimes models forget the images DO get used elsewhere, but Eric was thrilled with his new fame, and in fact, wanted to come in and do more photos (he'd beefed up quite a bit) and possibly do a solo.
So he came in to do some newer physique type shots, as well as some updated erotic images. I had a pretty hot video going for him, so his dick was bone hard, and dripping tons of pre-cum.
I asked him if he wanted to do the solo, and all he said was "Hurry." He IS a quiet one.
I setup the cameras and got them going just in time for him to pull his jeans off.
Eric is primarily a bottom, so if you like Asian bottom boys, you will love this video!
title: Eric Kim - Solo
